name: Immersive Horror Room: Hospital Escape Terror
summary:
"Never enter alone… 
In this haunted house, you really get attacked! It’s a horrifying experience unlike ever before pioneered by VR! 
Escape from this cursed abandoned hospital with your friend! 
Two to four people can take part at the same time. However, participants may not always be able to take part together. 
Please be warned there are violent scenes and grotesque expressions included in the experience."
